info.instruction: You are a student writing an essay on a given topic. Write around 300 words.

prompt.user: You are a student writing an essay on a given topic. Write around 300 words.
prompt.system: Write an essay for this task: A country becomes more interesting and develops more quickly when its population includes a mixture of nationalities.To what extent do you agree or disagree?Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
